think_procedure: The description of the knob 'track_functions' indicates that it has different settings that perform different functions. The settings include 'pl', 'all', and 'none'. The 'none' setting disables function statistics tracking, which is a different function compared to the 'pl' and 'all' settings. Therefore, this knob can be classified as a 'special knob'. The special value in this case is 'none'.
